item.title: My stat spy interface,
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

I added this on class9.java,

public static void statspy(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intstatspy = AddTab(15030); intstatspy.anIntArray240 = new int[14]; intstatspy.anIntArray241 = new int[14]; intstatspy.anIntArray272 = new int[14]; //Main interface intstatspy.anIntArray240[0] = 15031; intstatspy.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intstatspy.anIntArray272[0] = 16; AddInterfaceImage(15031, "statspy", "statspy1.png"); //Control 1 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[1] = 15032; intstatspy.anIntArray241[1] = 11; intstatspy.anIntArray272[1] = 23; AddInterfaceLabel(15032, "Label", wid, 1, 0x00FF00); //Control 2 of main interface (TextButton) intstatspy.anIntArray240[2] = 15033; intstatspy.anIntArray241[2] = 115; intstatspy.anIntArray272[2] = 257; //Control 3B of main interface (TextButton) intstatspy.anIntArray240[3] = 15034; intstatspy.anIntArray241[3] = 136; intstatspy.anIntArray272[3] = 268; AddInterfaceLabel(15034, "Close", wid, 1, 0x00FF00); AddInterfaceButton(15033, 90, 41, "Close", "statspy", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 4 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[4] = 15035; intstatspy.anIntArray241[4] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[4] = 58; AddInterfaceLabel(15035, "attack", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 5 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[5] = 15036; intstatspy.anIntArray241[5] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[5] = 96; AddInterfaceLabel(15036, "strength", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 6 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[6] = 15037; intstatspy.anIntArray241[6] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[6] = 127; AddInterfaceLabel(15037, "def", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 7 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[7] = 15038; intstatspy.anIntArray241[7] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[7] = 167; AddInterfaceLabel(15038, "range", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 8 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[8] = 15039; intstatspy.anIntArray241[8] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[8] = 198; AddInterfaceLabel(15039, "prayer", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 9 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[9] = 15040; intstatspy.anIntArray241[9] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[9] = 236; AddInterfaceLabel(15040, "magic", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 10 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[10] = 15041; intstatspy.anIntArray241[10] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[10] = 267; AddInterfaceLabel(15041, "hp", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 11 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[11] = 15042; intstatspy.anIntArray241[11] = 99; intstatspy.anIntArray272[11] = 67; AddInterfaceLabel(15042, "Combat Lvl:", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 12 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[12] = 15043; intstatspy.anIntArray241[12] = 99; intstatspy.anIntArray272[12] = 89; AddInterfaceLabel(15043, "Total Lvl:", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 13 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[13] = 15044; intstatspy.anIntArray241[13] = 99; intstatspy.anIntArray272[13] = 110;AddInterfaceLabel(15044, "Str Bonus:", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); }
But , i get this error =/ [img]http://yfrog.com/mwsinttulobrp[/img] [url=http://yfrog.com/mwsinttulobrp]http://yfrog.com/mwsinttulobrp[/url] What im doing wrong? [center]-----------------------------------Edit-------------------------------------[/center] I love it! Gratz, great work =)

item.title: My stat spy interface,
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

yugioh101:

yeh i know lol i dont really like the look of the boxes i think i might redo but idk i hate the auto adjust in the interface maker and the fact that you cant use the arrows to move pixel by pixel…

hold Alt while you move things, and it disables the “auto snapping” into place.

item.title: My stat spy interface,
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

Heres what you will be making!

[size=18pt]ONLY USE IF YOU HAVE LUNAR SPELLS!!![/size]

1zwon7d.png758×448

step 1)go into client and open up class9.java and add this,

public static void statspy(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intstatspy = AddTab(15030); intstatspy.anIntArray240 = new int[14]; intstatspy.anIntArray241 = new int[14]; intstatspy.anIntArray272 = new int[14]; //Main interface intstatspy.anIntArray240[0] = 15031; intstatspy.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intstatspy.anIntArray272[0] = 16; AddInterfaceImage(15031, "statspy", "statspy1.png"); //Control 1 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[1] = 15032; intstatspy.anIntArray241[1] = 11; intstatspy.anIntArray272[1] = 23; AddInterfaceLabel(15032, "Label", wid, 1, 0x00FF00); //Control 2 of main interface (TextButton) intstatspy.anIntArray240[2] = 15033; intstatspy.anIntArray241[2] = 115; intstatspy.anIntArray272[2] = 257; //Control 3B of main interface (TextButton) intstatspy.anIntArray240[3] = 15034; intstatspy.anIntArray241[3] = 136; intstatspy.anIntArray272[3] = 268; AddInterfaceLabel(15034, "Close", wid, 1, 0x00FF00); AddInterfaceButton(15033, 90, 41, "Close", "statspy", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 4 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[4] = 15035; intstatspy.anIntArray241[4] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[4] = 58; AddInterfaceLabel(15035, "attack", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 5 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[5] = 15036; intstatspy.anIntArray241[5] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[5] = 96; AddInterfaceLabel(15036, "strength", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 6 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[6] = 15037; intstatspy.anIntArray241[6] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[6] = 127; AddInterfaceLabel(15037, "def", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 7 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[7] = 15038; intstatspy.anIntArray241[7] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[7] = 167; AddInterfaceLabel(15038, "range", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 8 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[8] = 15039; intstatspy.anIntArray241[8] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[8] = 198; AddInterfaceLabel(15039, "prayer", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 9 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[9] = 15040; intstatspy.anIntArray241[9] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[9] = 236; AddInterfaceLabel(15040, "magic", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 10 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[10] = 15041; intstatspy.anIntArray241[10] = 33; intstatspy.anIntArray272[10] = 267; AddInterfaceLabel(15041, "hp", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 11 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[11] = 15042; intstatspy.anIntArray241[11] = 99; intstatspy.anIntArray272[11] = 67; AddInterfaceLabel(15042, "Combat Lvl:", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 12 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[12] = 15043; intstatspy.anIntArray241[12] = 99; intstatspy.anIntArray272[12] = 89; AddInterfaceLabel(15043, "Total Lvl:", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); //Control 13 of main interface (Label) intstatspy.anIntArray240[13] = 15044; intstatspy.anIntArray241[13] = 99; intstatspy.anIntArray272[13] = 110; AddInterfaceLabel(15044, "Str Bonus:", wid, 3, 0xFFFF00); }

Step 2)While in class9.java search for

aclass44 = aclass44

under that add this,

	statspy(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

step 3) if you get errors make sure you have this method,

[code]private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 GetInterfaceImage(String interfaceName, String s)
{
//Basically, just a user-friedly edited version of an old one.
long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l);
if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null)
{
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}
try
{
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Interface Images/" + interfaceName + “/” + s);
aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2);
}
catch(Exception exception)
{
return null;
}
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}

public static void AddInterfaceImage(int i, String interfaceName, String spriteName)
{
Class9 dSprite = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
dSprite.anInt250 = i;
dSprite.anInt236 = i;
dSprite.anInt262 = 5;
dSprite.anInt217 = 1;
dSprite.anInt214 = 0;
dSprite.anInt220 = 20;
dSprite.anInt267 = 20;
dSprite.aByte254 = 0;
dSprite.anInt230 = 52;
dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = GetInterfaceImage(interfaceName, spriteName);
dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = GetInterfaceImage(interfaceName, spriteName);
}

public static void AddInterfaceButton(int i, int width, int height, String tooltip, String interfaceName, String spriteName)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 1;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = width;
class9.anInt267 = height;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = 52;
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = GetInterfaceImage(interfaceName, spriteName);
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = GetInterfaceImage(interfaceName, spriteName);
class9.aString221 = tooltip;
}

public static void AddInterfaceLabel(int id, String text, Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 wid[], int font, int color)
{
Class9 Tab = AddTab(id);
Tab.anInt250 = id;

Tab.anInt262 = 4;
Tab.anInt217 = 0;
Tab.anInt220 = 174;
Tab.anInt267 = 11;
Tab.anInt214 = 0;
Tab.aByte254 = 0;
Tab.anInt230 = -1;
Tab.aBoolean223 = false;
Tab.aBoolean268 = true;
Tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_243 = wid[font];
Tab.aString248 = text;
Tab.aString228 = “”;
Tab.anInt232 = color;
Tab.anInt219 = 0;
Tab.anInt216 = 0;
Tab.anInt239 = 0;
}

public static void AddClickableText(int i, String text, String tooltip, Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 wid[], int font, int color, int width, int height)
{
Class9 Tab = AddTab(i);
Tab.anInt250 = i;
Tab.anInt236 = i;
Tab.anInt262 = 4;
Tab.anInt217 = 1;
Tab.anInt220 = width;
Tab.anInt267 = height;
Tab.anInt214 = 0;
Tab.aByte254 = 0;
Tab.anInt230 = -1;
Tab.aBoolean223 = false;
Tab.aBoolean268 = true;
Tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_243 = wid[font];
Tab.aString248 = text;
Tab.aString221 = tooltip;
Tab.aString228 = “”;
Tab.anInt232 = color;
Tab.anInt219 = 0;
Tab.anInt216 = 0;
Tab.anInt239 = 0;
}

public static void AddInterfaceModel(int ID, int mId, int modelZoom, int modelRT, int modelRT2)
{
Class9 Tab = AddTab(ID);
Tab.anInt250 = ID;
Tab.anInt236 = ID;
Tab.anInt262 = 6;
Tab.anInt217 = 0;
Tab.anInt233 = 1;
Tab.anInt214 = 0;
Tab.anInt220 = 512;
Tab.anInt267 = 334;
Tab.aByte254 = 0;
Tab.anInt230 = -1;
Tab.anInt234 = mId;
Tab.anInt269 = modelZoom;
Tab.anInt270 = modelRT;
Tab.anInt271 = modelRT2;
}

public static Class9 AddTab(int id)
{
Class9 Tab = aClass9Array210[id] = new Class9();
Tab.anInt250 = id;//250
Tab.anInt236 = id;//236
Tab.anInt262 = 0;//262
Tab.anInt217 = 0;//217
Tab.anInt214 = 0;
Tab.anInt220 = 512;//220
Tab.anInt267 = 334;//anint267
Tab.aByte254 = (byte)0;
Tab.anInt230 = 0;
return Tab;
}

public static Class9 AddDTab(int i)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;

public static void AddCharacter(int ID)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[ID] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = ID;
class9.anInt236 = ID;
class9.anInt262 = 6;

public static void AddInventoryItemGroup(int id, int h, int w)
{
Class9 Tab = aClass9Array210[id] = new Class9();
Tab.anIntArray253 = new int[w * h];
Tab.anIntArray252 = new int[w * h];
for(int i1 = 0; i1 < w * h; i1++)
{
Tab.anIntArray252[i1] = 0; //inv item stack size
Tab.anIntArray253[i1] = 0; //inv item ids
}
Tab.anIntArray247 = new int[20];
Tab.anIntArray215 = new int[20];
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < 20; i2++)
{
Tab.anIntArray247[i2] = 0;
Tab.anIntArray215[i2] = 0;
}

Tab.anInt220 = w;
Tab.anInt230 = -1;
Tab.anInt236 = id;
Tab.anInt250 = id;
Tab.anInt261 = 0;
Tab.anInt262 = 2;
Tab.anInt267 = h;

}

public static void SetContextOptions(int ID, String[] options)
{
if(aClass9Array210[ID] == null)
return;
String[] real = new String[5];
for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
real[i] = (i < options.length ? options[i] : null);
aClass9Array210[ID].aStringArray225 = real;
}[/code]

step 5) Now you are done with your client now go into your server and open up client.java search for this

castOnPlayer.sM(""+playerName+" is viewing your stats!");

there should be a bunch of sendquests replace from the first sendquests down to flushoutstream(); line with this,

sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerName+"'s combat stats", 15032); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerLevel[0]+"/"+castOnPlayer.getLevelForXP(castOnPlayer.playerXP[0])+"", 15035); sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerLevel[2]+"/"+castOnPlayer.getLevelForXP(castOnPlayer.playerXP[2])+"", 15036); sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerLevel[1]+"/"+castOnPlayer.getLevelForXP(castOnPlayer.playerXP[1])+"", 15037); sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerLevel[3]+"/"+castOnPlayer.getLevelForXP(castOnPlayer.playerXP[3])+"", 15041); sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerLevel[4]+"/"+castOnPlayer.getLevelForXP(castOnPlayer.playerXP[4])+"", 15038); sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerLevel[5]+"/"+castOnPlayer.getLevelForXP(castOnPlayer.playerXP[5])+"", 15039); sendQuest(""+castOnPlayer.playerLevel[6]+"/"+castOnPlayer.getLevelForXP(castOnPlayer.playerXP[6])+"", 15040); sendQuest("Combat Lvl:"+castOnPlayer.combatLevel, 15042); sendQuest("Total Lvl:"+castOnPlayer.total, 15043); sendQuest("Str Bonus:"+castOnPlayer.playerBonus[10], 15044); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(15030);

step 6) download my sprites HERE and place them in the interface images folder,
